ExampleDefinition.Title: Add Remove DataSeries
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to add and remove data-series and their associated RenderableSeries using SciChart.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Add Remove DataSeries</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to programmatically add and remove series in code.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Click 'Add Series' several times. Now click to select a series. With a series selected, click 'Delete Series'. </Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">The same thing can be achieved in MVVM, using our new MVVM SciChartSurface.SeriesSource API</Run>
